skills.skill: Software/Applications, Server, Storage, Networks, Security, Mobility, Messaging, Enterprise Voice
Azure Security, Microsoft 365, Active Directory, Azure Active Directory, Certificate Services
Microsoft Infrastructure components and PowerShell scripting

Azure cloud service areas: cloud readiness assessment, migration strategy development and planning, identity and access management, cloud billing and metering, cloud monitoring, cloud backup/recovery and DR, Azure cloud database, Azure Automation, files/storage, networking, and security solutions for Azure
Identity and Access Management solutions for hybrid cloud environment involving Azure

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead technical architect on Digital Infrastructure services around Azure Cloud offerings
Provide advanced to master technical design, scope and SOW deliverables for deployment & migration services to customers
Deliver technical writing, develop solutions and consult on complex Cloud deployments
Client interaction, defining and analyzing business and technical needs, solution development, and assisting Sales in closing the SOW deal
Work on billable Engineering work, complete complex projects, work independently, and mentor peers
Acquire new business, expand Cloud Services business in current customer accounts, create and deliver business/technical presentations to C-Level executives and Technical resources
Speak from experience, offer insight on successes and failures relative to the customer's industry and provide solutions based on the Cloud Services solution portfolio
Lead the design/deployment of innovative service solutions for Brillio Azure cloud service offerings
Consult with clients to establish, maintain and refresh their strategic direction in cloud adoption
Support the full lifecycle of cloud computing management, from customer needs analysis to environment assessment, through design, test, migration, and operation
Provide engineering designs and project plans for cloud migration, cloud operation, and cloud IT optimization
Continually research, evaluate and apply emerging technologies to improve the business outcome of service to customers
